subsection.name: Description
subsection.div: Checks that local, non-final variable names conform to a specified pattern. A catch parameter is considered to be a local variable.
subsection.p:
This check does not support pattern variables. Instead, use
PatternVariableName.

tr.td: Allow one character variable name in initialization expressions in FOR loop if one char variable name is prohibited by format regexp.
Sets the pattern to match valid identifiers.
